com.sinosoft.one.mvc.web.instruction.reply.transport
接口 Transport

public interface Transport

作者：
Dhanji R. Prasanna (dhanji@gmail.com)

方法摘要
 String contentType()
          Returns the HTTP content type marshalled by this transport.
<T> void
out(OutputStream out, T data)
          Converts a given object into transportable data and writes it to the provided OutputStream.
 

方法详细信息

out

<T> void out(OutputStream out,
             T data)
         throws IOException
Converts a given object into transportable data and writes it to the provided OutputStream.

参数：
out - An open outputstream to write to. This stream will NOT be closed.
data - An object representing the data to be written out.
抛出：
IOException - Thrown if there is an error writing to this stream.

contentType

String contentType()
Returns the HTTP content type marshalled by this transport. For example, the transport transforms plain strings to and from the HTTP stream. Its content type is text/plain. This is only a default (or suggested) content type. You may of course, return whatever content type is most suitable if using this transport to deliver web responses.

返回：
A non-empty string representing a HTTP content (mime) type.
